head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LIEBERMAN, LUCILLE NAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LIEBERMAN, LUCILLE NAN

block.p: LIEBERMAN--Lucille Nan, on January 29, 2007, beloved wife of the late James Lieberman, devoted mother of Meg Lieberman; and grandmother of Amanda, Jeremy and David Gold. Cherished brother of Elliott Goldstein. Past President of Connecticut Association of Health Sciences Librarians. Services Thursday, February 1st, at 11:00am, Abraham L. Green and Son, Fairfield, CT.

LIEBERMAN--Lucille Nan, on January 29, 2007, beloved wife of the late James Lieberman, devoted mother of Meg Lieberman; and grandmother of Amanda, Jeremy and David Gold. Cherished brother of Elliott Goldstein. Past President of Connecticut Association of Health Sciences Librarians. Services Thursday, February 1st, at 11:00am, Abraham L. Green and Son, Fairfield, CT.
